<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104121</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973987</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Discrimination Based on Race Curriculum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterscheidung basiert auf Rennen-Lehrplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discrimination basée sur le programme d'études 
de course</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discriminação baseada no curriculum da raça</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distinzione basata sul programma di studi della 
corsa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάκριση βασισμένη στο πρόγραμμα σπουδών φυλών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discriminación basada en plan de estudios de la 
raza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson explores discrimination based on race. The lesson is in three sections, each framed by guiding questions such as: What is race? What are my beliefs about racial differences? What are some of the causes and impacts of racial discrimination? What is being done to address Racial discrimination? What can I do?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion erforscht die Unterscheidung, die 
auf Rennen basiert. Die Lektion ist in drei Kapiteln, jedes 
gestaltet durch leitende Fragen wie: Was ist Rennen? Was 
sind mein Glaube über rassische Unterschiede? Was sind einige 
der Ursachen und der Auswirkungen der rassischen Unterscheidung? 
Was wird getan, um rassische Unterscheidung zu adressieren? 
Was kann ich tun?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon explore la discrimination basée sur 
la course. La leçon est dans trois sections, chacune encadrées
par des questions de guidage comme : Quelle est course ? 
Quelle est ma croyance au sujet des différences raciales ? 
Quels sont certains des causes et des impacts de la 
discrimination raciale ? Qu'est fait pour adresser la 
discrimination raciale ? Queest-ce que je peux faire ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição explora a discriminação baseada na 
raça. A lição está em três seções, cada uma moldadas por 
perguntas guiando como: Que é raça? Que são minha 
opinião sobre diferenças raciais? Que são alguns das causas e
dos impactos da discriminação racial? Que está sendo feito 
para se dirigir à discriminação racial? Que posso eu fazer?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione esplora la distinzione basata sulla
corsa. La lezione è in tre sezioni, ciascuno incorniciate dalle
domande guidanti come: Che cosa è corsa? Che cosa sono la
mia credenza circa le differenze razziali? Che cosa sono alcuni 
delle cause e degli effetti di distinzione razziale? Che cosa 
sta facendo per richiamare la distinzione razziale? Che cosa 
posso fare?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα ερευνά τη διάκριση βασισμένη στη 
φυλή. Το μάθημα είναι σε τρία τμήματα, κάθε ένα που 
πλαισιώνεται με την καθοδήγηση των ερωτήσεων όπως: Τι είναι
φυλή; Ποιες είναι οι πεποιθήσεις μου για τις φυλετικές 
διαφορές; Τι είναι μερικές από τις αιτίες και τις 
επιδράσεις της φυλετικής διάκρισης; Τι γίνεται για να 
εξετάσει τη φυλετική διάκριση; Τι μπορώ να κάνω;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección explora la discriminación basada en
la raza. La lección está en tres secciones, cada uno 
enmarcadas por preguntas de guía por ejemplo: ¿Cuál es raza? 
¿Cuáles son mi creencia sobre diferencias raciales? 
¿Cuáles son algunos de las causas y de los impactos de la 
discriminación racial? ¿Qué se está haciendo para tratar la 
discriminación racial? ¿Qué puedo hacer?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973987</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>

            <string language="en">Custom License</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
